Class ClientNetworkTCPManager

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am40.client.network.ClientNetworkTCPManager
All Implemented Interfaces:

public class ClientNetworkTCPManager extends Object implements NetworkManagerClient
Concrete network protocol implementation for TCP
